channel.title: Markdown on Mairin Deith
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Mairin Deith

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE) R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit Including Plots You can also embed plots. See Figure \@ref(fig:pie) for example: par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'), col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'), init.
